特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Students can expect to learn through face-to-face lessons, mini-lectures and discussions. This class will be taught using a number of applications including Google Classroom. We will also be listening to podcasts about behavioural economics and write summaries about the podcast content and your opinions/reflections on the content.
For students with permission to take classes online: lesson materials will be available on Google Classroom.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be expected to prepare for lessons before class. Students will also be expected to conduct research for presentations and projects outside of class.
